modalContent.title: Real-Time Incident Response System
modalContent.description: An automated incident response system built with Amazon Connect that triggers escalation calls when alerts are received. The system uses AWS Lambda to orchestrate outbound calls, with automatic escalation to secondary contacts if the first contact doesn't respond. Features include call status monitoring, DynamoDB logging, and SNS integration for alert management.
